title: Bad Boy Blues
description: He’s not your typical bad boy…When Elliott McKinley fled her former life for the luxe vacation town of Evergreen Cove she wasn’t looking to be saved… until a flat tire leaves her stranded. Now she can’t stop thinking about the mysterious stranger who swooped in to help and left only his first name…With his dangerous job and busy life, Officer Brady Hutchins prefers steamy one-night hookups over romantic relationships. The beautiful stranger in Evergreen Cove fits that profile perfectly. But after a scorching encounter leaves them both breathless, he’s considering a future with the gorgeous brunette… If only he can convince her to stay.
author: Jessica Lemmon
